summary: Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wild animals, and how he becomes king of the jungle.
cast: Jason Scott Lee|Cary Elwes|Lena Headey|Sam Neill|John Cleese|Jason Flemyng|Stefan Kalipha|Ron Donachie|Anirudh Agarwal|Faran Tahir|Sean Naegeli|Joanna Wolff|Liza Walker|Rachel Robertson|Natalie Morse|Gerry Crampton|Amrik Gill|Rick Glassey|David Vincent Bobb|Buck|Ed Gale|Teddy
